Orchard Tactician.description: Skilled in strategy and resource management.

Fruit Artisan.description: Expert in crafting with fruit-based materials.

Grove Keeper.description: Protector of natural spaces and plant life.

Juice Brewer.description: Specialist in creating juices, brews, and elixirs.

Seed Scholar.description: Knowledgeable in seeds, plants, and their properties.

Vine Acrobat.description: Agile and skilled in navigating through foliage.

Market Trader.description: Adept in commerce and trade negotiations.

Pulp Medic.description: Proficient in fruit-based medicine and healing.

Peel Spy.description: Stealthy and cunning, adept at gathering information and espionage.

Rind Warrior.description: Trained in combat, particularly in defending orchards and groves.

Thorn Hunter.description: Specialized in tracking and dealing with pests or threats to ecosystems.

Blossom Bard.description: Entertainer and storyteller, captivating audiences with fruit-themed tales and songs.

Zest Chef.description: Culinary expert, creating delicious and nutritious meals from various fruits.

Sprout Druid.description: Connected to the natural world, able to communicate with and influence plant life.

Harvest Laborer.description: Hardworking and enduring, experienced in the physical aspects of harvesting.

Berry Scout.description: Explorer and pathfinder, adept at navigating through the wilderness.

Citrus Diplomat.description: Eloquent and persuasive, skilled in diplomacy and conflict resolution.

Melon Guard.description: Protector and security expert, ensuring the safety of fruit communities.

Graft Innovator.description: Creative and experimental, adept at combining different plant traits.

Worm Whisperer.description: Unique ability to communicate with and control worms and other small creatures.
